EmailTemplate.name: 2021 Dealer Update #3.2021 Dealer Update #3
EmailTemplate.subject: Honeywell Sales Bulletins - January 2021
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Sales Bulletins | January 2021 New Sales Bulletins Honeywell is pleased to announce the following bulletin:
- 2021-15 Rev A <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2021-15 Rev A CAS-100 TCAS II Sales Promotion.pdf]]> CAS 100B TCAS / ACAS II Traffic Computer Sales Promotion - 2021-44 <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2021-44-JetWave-promotions-for-Business-Aircraft.pdf]]> JetWave Promotions - 2021-49 <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2021-49-RESCU-406-AFN-to-AFN2-Trade-In-Program.pdf]]> RESCU 406® AFN2 ELT Trade-In Program
Dealers can find this bulletin on our website <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/about-us/about-myaerospace]]> under Purchase/Orders/Sales Bulletins.
Click here <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/Subscription_Page.html]]> to sign up for Honeywell Aerospace email communications.
